name: Red owl pillow
description:
This cute red owl pillow was created using a posie patch and calico covering. It measures 60 x 70 cm, has 2 ribbon ties along the side seam, and a removable down insert.

To clean the cover you can remove insert and gently hand wash using cold water and a mild detergent, let air dry, and iron with steam on a medium setting to remove any wrinkles.

This item ships via Australia Post.  
For all International orders please contact for pricing details.

Thanks!

name: Paintbrush roll
description:
This paintbrush roll is handmade from start to finish. The fabric is a medium weight durable cotton canvas, and I screenprint my designs using non-toxic inks.

The roll is 33" long and 16" tall. The sleeve is 8" tall and has 14 sections ranging from 1.5" wide to 3" wide, and can be used for make-up brushes, crochet and knitting needle, pencils, pens, markers, crayons etc

I can make custom rolls with pockets of specific sizes.

Thanks!

name: Fabric buckets
description:
Perfect to hold your bits and bobs around the home. 

Fabric and batting is made from 100% cotton.
Measures 27cm wide x 19cm deep x 19cm tall.
